entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Rain mixed with snow late this afternoon. Fog along parts of the coast this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning then southeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7 except plus 3 along parts of the coast. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:42 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to periods of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 08:42 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4 except 9 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4 except 9 inland. Forecast issued 08:42 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
